task.title: Copying a Reusable Segment
task.shortdesc: Copy a reusable segment when you want to create a new segment based on an existing segment.

context.p: For example, you might want to create a segment that is identical to an existing segment, except that one condition is changed. Copying the existing segment enables you to create a new segment that is identical to the existing segment, except for the one condition that you change in the copy.

step.cmd: Select the segment you want to copy, then click Copy.
step.stepresult: The copy of the segment is added to the Segments list. The copy has the same name as the original segment, with "(Copy)" added to the end of the name.

step.cmd: Select Edit from the drop-down menu next to the name of the segment copy, then make any desired changes.
